line.text:
Planned Work
[2] Service operates in two sections:

1. Between 241 St and 149 St-Grand Concourse
2. Between 149 St-Grand Concourse and Flatbush Av
Weekend, 3:45 AM to 10 PM, Saturday, Aug 9

• Transfer at 149 St-Grand Concourse to continue your trip.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work

For service to E Tremont Av, 174, Freeman, Simpson Sts, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs,
take the [2] to 149 St/Grand Concourse and transfer to a Wakefield-bound [2].

For service from these stations, take the [2] to E 180 St and transfer to a
149 St/Grand Concourse-bound [2].

Notes: [2] service operates in two sections; no [5] trains at these stations during this time.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

and transfer to a downtown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq
and transfer to a Bronx-bound [6].

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Pelham Bay Park and transfer to a
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Note: Buhre Av and Zerega Av Stations are closed for renovation.




Planned Work

[2] and [4] trains provide alternate service

Weekend, Saturday, Aug 9

[5] Service operates between Dyre Av and E 180 St all weekend.

[2] trains provide alternate service between E 180 St and 149 St-Grand Concourse.*
[4] trains make all [5] stops between 149 St-Grand Concourse and Bowling Green.

• Transfer between [5] and [2] trains at E 180 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

*Please review [2] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
All times until 5 AM Tue, Sep 2

Â


[G] Service operates between Church Av and Nassau Av.

Â


[SB]Â Manhattan Av shuttle buses run between Nassau Av and Court Sq,
stopping at Greenpoint Av and 21 St.
[SB]Â McGuinness Blvd shuttle buses run between Lorimer St [L] and Court Sq,
stopping near [G] stations at Nassau Av, Greenpoint Av and 21 St.

Â

- Transfer between Manhattan Av [SB] buses and [G] trains at Nassau Av.
- Transfer between McGuinness Blvd [SB] buses and [G] [L] trains at Lorimer St/Metropolitan Av.

Â

Â Available service to/from Manhattan:

Â

- Transfer out-of-system (with MetroCard) between Broadway [G] and Lorimer St [J] [M] Stations.
- Transfer between [G] [L] trains at Metropolitan Av/Lorimer St.
- Transfer between [A] [C] [G] trains at Hoyt-Schermerhorn Sts.

BxM3, BxM4, BxM6, BxM7, BxM8, BxM9, BxM10Â and BxM11Â bus service detour due to Rabia Parade on Madison Av between 23 StÂ and 42 St.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: via E 23 St continue to 3 Av, left on 3 Av (service all bus stops at corresponding streets) continue to E 42 St, left on Madison Av, right to regular route.

BxM6, BxM7, BxM8, BxM9 andÂ BxM10 starts trips on 3 Av between E 23 St and E 24 St.

BxM3, BxM4 and BxM11 starts trips on 3 Av between E 28 St and E 29 St.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Danbury
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 08/08/2014 11:06PM

Buses will replace weekend train service on the Danbury Branch to accommodate work at grade crossings. Weekend substitute bus service will be provided:

Â . Friday, August 8 - Sunday, August 10 (through last train)

. Friday, August 15 - Sunday, August 17 (through last train)

Â . Saturday, August 23 - Sunday, August 24 (through last train)

See bus schedules at http://bit.ly/1AzzFuU We appreciate your patience during this service change.



Planned Work  Posted: 08/09/2014 11:03AM

Metro-North — Buses replace train service between Danbury and South Norwalk

Weekends, 9 PM Fri to 1:35 AM Mon, Aug 8 - 11 • Aug 15 - 18
7:25 AM Sat to 1:35 AM Mon, Aug 23 - 25

Buses will make stops at Danbury, Bethel, Redding, Branchville, Cannondale,
Wilton, Merritt 7 and South Norwalk Stations.

This is being done to allow work on the grade crossings on the Danbury Branch.
